meanings: instigation, incitement, demagogy, demagoguery, instigate, incite

vlive.korean: 약간 그런 느낌인가? - 그렇지 선동하고 그런... - 과대? Is it like that? - They sort of lead... - Best in department? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🍫🍫🍫🍫🍫
vlive.english: Is it like that? - They sort of lead... - Best in department?

[선동과 날조] 그 순간 산들이 형 벌써 다 먹어갑니다. Sandeul already ate everything. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [2년 전 오늘의 B1A4] 그 많던 산들피자는 누가 다 먹었을까?🍕 (Sandeul eating pizza with Gongchan)

vlive.korean: [피자 조각 선동과 날조로 마무리된 산들이의 저녁 시간] 봐 이런 이상한 얘기를 계속... He keeps on saying weird things... 듣기 View video V PICK! : [2년 전 오늘의 B1A4] 그 많던 산들피자는 누가 다 먹었을까?🍕 (Sandeul eating pizza with Gongchan)
vlive.english: He keeps on saying weird things...

examples.korean: He incited the workforce to come out on strike. 발음듣기 그는 노동자들에게 파업을 하러 나오도록 선동했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He incited the workforce to come out on strike. 발음

examples.korean: They were accused of inciting the crowd to violence. 발음듣기 그들은 군중에게 폭력 행위를 하도록 선동했다는 비난을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were accused of inciting the crowd to violence. 발음

examples.korean: It was done at his instigation. 발음듣기 그것은 그가 선동한 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was done at his instigation. 발음

examples.korean: He was a speaker who could really whip up a crowd. 발음듣기 그는 정말 군중을 선동할 수 있는 연설가였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was a speaker who could really whip up a crowd. 발음

examples.korean: the instigators of the riots 발음듣기 그 폭동 선동자들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the instigators of the riots 발음
